long_description: A great size for long-weekend trips, the Patagonia Black Hole Wheeled Duffel 45L is made from burly waterproof fabric with water-resistant zippers and seams to withstand rain and rough handling. U-shaped lid allows quick access to the main compartment, while 2 zippered mesh pockets inside keep small items organized. Zippered exterior pocket provides an easy-access location for your boarding pass, an energy bar or a paperback. Sturdy frame sheet protects the duffel from baggage-handler abuse and keeps your Black Hole upright, even when it's loaded to the max. Oversized wheels deliver a smooth ride; bottom is padded with foam to protect contents. Carrying options include the main webbing handles (with snap closure), a 2-position, telescoping handle or the 2 haul loops on either end. Lash additional gear to the outside with 4 corner-mounted daisy chains. Patagonia Black Hole Wheeled duffel is made from 1,200-denier polyester (50% solution-dyed) with a thermoplastic urethane-film laminate and a Durable Water Repellent finish.
short_description: A great size for long-weekend trips, the Patagonia Black Hole Wheeled Duffel 45L is made from burly waterproof fabric with water-resistant zippers and seams to withstand rain and rough handling.
